alert.note: Alert for Stokes (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 2:42PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Stokes County through 315 PM EDT... At 242 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Walnut Cove, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Walnut Cove... Danbury... Pine Hall... Dillard... Hanging Rock State Park... Germanton... and Meadows. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
